titleInfo.title: PZ 3448/40 Arrangements for Mr Belgrave's Wife and Son to join him at Bahrain

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 13; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding travel to Bahrain for the wife (Marjorie) and son (James) of Charles Belgrave (Adviser to the Government of Bahrain). The main correspondence covers cost and visa arrangements, and is between the Government of India (John Percival Gibson) and the agent of the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (HR Ballantyne).
